attributes.action: Make the first day out of lockdown a bank holiday so we can get pissed in pubs
attributes.additional_details: I believe it is a crucial part of the British culture.
attributes.background: Currently the United Kingdom are battling COVID-19 and are under strict lockdown rules. I propose that we make the day we leave lockdown and businesses (especially pubs with ice cold beer) are able to return to normal, that this is made a bank holiday so we can sit in pub gardens and get pissed.
